channel.title: Stuck in tram railway system. (c2c2a)
channel.description:
> Got there by tram. > Turned off power > Found one of the plugs in the water > Plugged it in socket > Turned on power > Tram lift descends > V'gon and Headcrabs spawn > Neutralized > Run tram onto lift > Nothing happens, noting to interact with.
I see that it's a room there with one of those guys who spew acid on you, but i can't get in that control room. Any suggestions?
Edit: Screenshot of location; [url=https://imgur.com/tp0L3]![](upload://hZtUvLutaoRQTqw2lFkUN5Ohdes.jpeg)[/url]
Frustrated!

item.title: Stuck in tram railway system. (c2c2a)
item.dc:creator: Edited
item.description:
AH! Thanks a bunch, tried that door before, but it did not seem to work.

Appreciate it!

Read full topic

item.title: Stuck in tram railway system. (c2c2a)
item.dc:creator: PlausibleSarge
item.description:
Edited:

If so, how do I enter that office/control room?

next to the locked door is a pipe. Behind that pipe is a ladder. It is straight forward from there

Read full topic

item.title: Stuck in tram railway system. (c2c2a)
item.dc:creator: Edited
item.description:
PlausibleSarge:

if you mean you are stuck behind the security door, you need to open it in the office to your right

If so, how do I enter that office/control room?

Read full topic

item.description:
if you mean you are stuck behind the security door, you need to open it in the office to your right

item.title: Stuck in tram railway system. (c2c2a)
item.dc:creator: Edited
item.description:
Got there by tram.
Turned off power
Found one of the plugs in the water
Plugged it in socket
Turned on power
Tram lift descends
V’gon and Headcrabs spawn
Neutralized
Run tram onto lift
Nothing happens, noting to interact with.

I see that it’s a room there with one of those guys who spew acid on you, but i can’t get in that control room. Any suggestions?

Edit: Screenshot of location;

Frustrated!

Read full topic
